data.text:
Boutique hotel in the center of Barcelona, close to everything, we knew Barcelona on foot, the rooms are very clean, spacious, the staff is excellent, especially Fernando, helped us and informed us everything we asked, which was not little and is very funny.
In the afternoon, they give free drinks and snacks as a courtesy.
We will definitely come back!
data.title: Beautiful experience

data.text: Nice location close to Casa Battlo and within walking distance to many restaurants and nice areas.  Fun and unique boutique feel with friendly employees.  Nice happy hour with free drinks, but no snacks this year.  No breakfast except muffins.  There is a restaurant next door with pretty good and reasonable breakfast, but they don't open until 8am.  For a hotel that prides themselves on good scents, it was a bit ironic that there was a slight odor in the bathroom.  Overall a very good experience, but there is a slight tradeoff with conveniences of big established hotels compared with the boutique hotel.
data.title: Very good, but not perfect boutique hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PerP542,

Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay at our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our prime location, unique boutique ambiance, and the friendliness of our staff.

Your feedback is very valuable to us as we continually strive to improve our guests' experience. We have noted your comments about the bathroom odor and are investigating, as maintaining our reputation for pleasant aromas throughout the hotel is of utmost importance to us.

We appreciate your understanding of the differences between the amenities offered by larger hotels versus the unique experiences provided by boutique hotels such as ours. We are glad that your overall experience was very good, and we are committed to making every stay perfect.

Thank you once again for your review. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for an even more satisfying stay.

Best regards,
The Hotel Praktik Èssens eam
owner_response.author: Dirección Hotel Praktik Essens

data.text:
This is a true gem in Barcelona. The hotel and employees are amazing. They are there to help all the time. There is a great working space if you are travelling for business. The rooms are so spacious and comfortable. 
The location is so central with easy access to train, metro and Aerobus.
The hotel has a great ambience and perfume that adds to the magic of Barcelona.
data.title: Boutique Gem in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
It was a great pleasure for us to host you and we would like to thank you most sincerely for your charming review!
We celebrate that we could make your stay that enjoyable and your kind comments towards our staff service are much appreciate. 

Thanks for the 5 stars given and we can't wait to welcome you back again.

Best regard from Barcelona. 

HOTEL PRAKTIK ÈSSENS
owner_response.author: Dirección Hotel Praktik Essens

data.text: You cannot fault the location of this hotel and the clean room. We found the staff friendly and helpful. We had the entry level room which was small, but we managed and the bed was comfortable and the air condition worked well. We slept amazingly well given its location near the Passiege del Gracia and found it quiet. We enjoyed our stay. Whilst there were a few minor drawbacks, as in we did not get the advertised room upgrade as it was very busy, the happy hour was hammered by a few and the snacks whilst provided were basic, for us the benefits were greater than a few hiccups. I would return but get a larger room. The coffee was welcome and the pastries were ok although repeated which made it boring. The lounge area is a nice comfortable place and the outdoor area lounges were pretty, with nice lighting. Housekeeping staff worked hard. The room decor was simple, comfortable clean and modern. The shower however spilled over into the room which was a design flaw  and annoying.
data.title: A Pleasant stay in a great location.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 

Thanks for sharing such a detailed review about your recent stay at Praktik Èssens. 
We celebrate that overall you had a good stay with us in line up with your expectations. 

We appreciate all your comments that will definitely drive us keep improving. 
It makes us so happy knowing you had an enjoyable stay these days in Barcelona and so that we help a bit on it :)

You know now where we are for your next visits to Barcelona. 

Best regards.

HOTEL PRAKTIK ÈSSENS
owner_response.author: Dirección Hotel Praktik Essens

data.text: I am currently staying here. It’s August and extremely hot outside, but this small, boutique hotel is an oasis! Very comfortable, good location, lovely seating areas, an overall charming place. I would highly recommend this small, boutique hotel.
data.title: Charming oasis!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
Thank you for such positive feedback, it is much appreciated!
We really celebrate that you had such a great stay with us. That is exactly the most important point for us.
As you have mentioned, We are a small hotel,  with a prime location, where we try to take care of every detail.
We hope to welcome you back to Praktik Èssens Hotel in the not too distant future.
Yours faithfully,

Andrea Garrido
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Dirección Hotel Praktik Essens
